Query to find the employee that handled order 10248 (one join query)

test_cases.query: Give the names of products that were ordered as part of order 10248
test_cases.ground_truth: The products are Product QMVUN, Product RJVNM and Product GEEOO

test_cases.query: Give the category name and supplier company name for the product with id 11
test_cases.ground_truth: Product with id 11 has category name 'Dairy Products' and supplier company name 'Supplier EQPNC'
test_cases.description: Query to find the products in order 10248 (two join queries)

test_cases.query: Give the customer name, employee name and shipping company name of order with id 10249
test_cases.ground_truth: For the order with id 10249 the customer name is Customer FAPSM, the employee name is Paul Suurs and the shipping company name is Shipper GVSUA
test_cases.description: Query to find the products in order 10249 (three join queries)

test_cases.query: Show me a summary for employee with id 8 including their name, which territories and which regions they manage, and how many unique customers they've served
test_cases.ground_truth: The employee with id 8 is Maria Cameron manages 4 territories (Beachwood, Findlay, Philadelphia, Racine) in the Northern region and has served 56 unique customers
test_cases.description: Query to find information for Maria Cameron (4 join queries)
